frozen_definition.name: MindfulSpend
frozen_definition.signal_source: Budget app reviews show '#1 reason they quit a budgeting app was too much daily maintenance' and 'wrong budgeting tool leads to burnout'
frozen_definition.description: Gentle financial awareness app that promotes spending mindfulness without complex budgeting or overwhelming maintenance requirements
frozen_definition.target_user: People who abandoned traditional budget apps due to complexity but want financial awareness without guilt or pressure
frozen_definition.pain_point_evidence: Users report YNAB 'can be overwhelming' with 'rigidity' and 'complicated interface' leading to app abandonment
frozen_definition.differentiation: Mindfulness-based approach vs. strict budgeting, focuses on awareness over control and restriction
frozen_definition.subscription_fit: Premium includes spending insights, goal setting tools, and partner/family sharing features

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic mindfulness features, premium for detailed insights and sharing
